lines.text: There's enough animals down there to re-stock every zoo in the world.
Boy, never kill for fun. Only for food!
I wasn't going to shoot him.
Boy man now... do man's work.
Just thinking about all the happy years we've spent in the jungle together.
Tarzan, weren't you ever lonesome living alone in the jungle before you met Jane?
No. Lots of animal friends in jungle. Jungle much more peaceful before woman come.
Then there's nothing we could offer that would make you change your mind.
In our civilization, we believe in always keeping an open mind.
In your civilization, open mind means that one must agree with what you yourself say.
Animals belong in jungle, not in cages.
